p: The fresh plant contains approximately 0.6% essential oil (EO), 2.07% reducing sugars, 4.9% polysaccharides, 2.11% minerals, 1.67% free acids, and 1.31% tannic agents [ 68]. The main monoterpenes identified in the EO obtained from fresh leaves are 65% thujone, 8% isothujone, 8% fenchone, 5% sabines, and 2% Î±-pinene [ 68]. Other identified monoterpenes are: carvotanacetone, origanol, origanes, myrcen, and camphen [ 68, 69, 70, 71].
